name: Premium Medjool Dates
description: Hand-picked, naturally sweet Medjool dates. Perfect for snacking or special occasions.

name: Mixed Dried Fruits
description: A delightful mix of premium dried fruits including apricots, cranberries, and raisins.

name: Dried Figs
description: Sweet and chewy dried figs, packed with nutrients and natural goodness.

name: Organic Deglet Noor Dates
description: Semi-dry dates with a delicate honey-like taste. Perfect for baking and cooking.

name: Premium Dried Apricots
description: Naturally sweet Turkish apricots, dried to perfection. Rich in vitamins and minerals.

name: Dried Cranberries
description: Naturally sweetened dried cranberries. Perfect for snacking, baking, or adding to cereals.
